org.restlet.util
クラス CharacterReadingListener

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.util.ReadingListener
      org.restlet.util.ByteReadingListener
          org.restlet.util.CharacterReadingListener
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
SelectionListener
public abstract class CharacterReadingListener
extends ByteReadingListener

Selection listener notifying new content as a Reader. It relies on the representation's character set for proper character decoding.

作成者:
Jerome Louvel

コンストラクタの概要

          Default constructor.
CharacterReadingListener(Representation source, int bufferSize)
          Constructor.

protected  void onContent(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
          Callback invoked when new content is available.

          Callback invoked when new content is available.

コンストラクタの詳細

CharacterReadingListener

public CharacterReadingListener(Representation source)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Default constructor. Uses a byte buffer of IoUtils#BUFFER_SIZE length.

パラメータ:
source - The source representation.
例外:
java.io.IOException

CharacterReadingListener

public CharacterReadingListener(Representation source,
                                int bufferSize)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Constructor. Uses a byte buffer of a given size.

パラメータ:
source - The source representation.
bufferSize - The byte buffer to use.
例外:
java.io.IOException
メソッドの詳細

onContent

protected final void onContent(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
クラス ByteReadingListener の記述:
Callback invoked when new content is available.

定義:
クラス ByteReadingListener 内の onContent
パラメータ:
inputStream - The input stream allowing to retrieve the new content.

onContent

protected abstract void onContent(java.io.Reader reader)
Callback invoked when new content is available.

パラメータ:
reader - The reader allowing to retrieve the new content.
